name: Cook me a Story
description:
Home is about the memories you create with people you love. CMS is a restaurant that wants to take you back to those memories. Our guests come here and tell us about the adventures they used to live at the old grandma's house, or how was challenging showing out who they were to their parents... There are a lot of stories to cook, you'll see! Grab a pan!

In our game you have to find the correct ingredients based on the hints given by Mr. Pig to unlock one more piece of the story.
